content: simple seamless and adaptable this easy cropped cardigan pattern uses bamboo yarn and single and double_crochet stitches to create an essential wardrobe piece modify the length skip the buttons but whatever you do don t miss the chance to make your next favorite toss-on cardi advanced beginner level skills you ll practice include single_crochet double_crochet meeting gauge and working in the round because the sweater is worked in one piece you won t have anything to seam at the end pattern is written in nine sizes extra small to 5x and requires approximately 1250-2250 yards of lion brand truboo or similar yarn the sample pictured is a m on a 5 9 model with a 38 bust the cardigan is meant to fit with between 6 and 10 of positive ease at the bust for a tighter fit size down downloading - this listing is for the yarrow cardigan crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our favorite crochet cardigan patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/modern-free-crochet-cardigan-patterns/
